text: Russische invasie van Oekraïne: Lijst van sleutelgebeurtenissen, dag 783"Onderwerp: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 783Tweet:🚨 Nieuwsflash: Russische invasie van Oekraïne continues into its 783rd day. Here are the main developments:🔹 Intense fighting in eastern Ukraine, with both sides accusing each other of launching attacks.🔹 Russia's President Putin announces plans to deploy new missile systems in response to NATO's "aggressive" actions.🔹 Ukraine's President Zelensky calls for increased international pressure on Russia to end the conflict.🔹 The US and European Union impose fresh sanctions on Russian officials and entities over their role in the conflict.🔹 Aid organizations warn of a humanitarian crisis in eastern Ukraine, with thousands of civilians facing food and medicine shortages.Staan together against war and aggression! Let's work towards a peaceful solution for all parties involved. 💪🏽
